mapper.select: SELECT qctl.fUuid AS 'uuid', qctl.fQZOperationTypeUuid AS 'qzOperationTypeUuid', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', IF((qctl.fTerminalType = 'PC'), qs.fPcGroup, qs.fPhoneGroup) AS 'group', qctl.fStatus AS 'isDelete', qs.fType AS 'type', qctl.fTerminalType AS 'terminalType', qctl.fStartTime AS 'startTime', qctl.fEndTime AS 'endTime', qctl.fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', qctl.fCreateTime AS 'createTime' FROM t_qz_setting qs, t_qz_capture_title_log qctl WHERE qs.fUuid = qctl.fQZSettingUuid AND qctl.fStatus = #{isDelete} AND qctl.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} ORDER BY qctl.fCreateTime LIMIT 1
